attributes.action: Offer fair incentives and clear guidance for fleets to run the greenest cars.
attributes.background: Businesses want to run the cleanest cars, but are not being adequately incentivised to do so. We are campaigning for fleets to get the advanced information and fair taxation system they need to keep employees in the newest, safest, greenest cars.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Offer fair incentives and clear guidance for fleets to run the greenest cars".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
